oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Matt Jenkins - 2017-12-30
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by singer songwriter Matt Jenkins from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 30, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Matt Jenkins;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments begin in progress by Sara Lederach with introduction of the Matt Jenkins / (02:31) Opening comments by Matt / (03:48) Introduction of the next song / (04:50) Performs Song For Another Time / (08:01) Intros next song / (09:40) Performs Cop Car / (13:20) Answers question about rhyme rules in songwriting / (14:56) Answers question about favorite places to play his unrecorded songs / (15:31) Answers question about how long it usually takes to write a song / (16:13) Answers question about where he get his inspiration for songs / (17:35) Intros next song / (19:31) Performs Setting The World On Fire / (22:37) Talks about writing songs that slip through the cracks and intros the next song / (24:12) Performs Watered Down / (26:52) Intros next song / (27:21) Performs Do I Make You Wanna / (30:45) Answers question about how often he writes songs aimed for specific artists / (31:51) Answers question about artist changes to his lyrics /

(32:35) Answers question about what makes a song a hit / (33:22) Answers question about artists purchasing rights to songs / (34:20) Answers question about does he co-write with artists who record his songs / (34:55) Answers question about ever feeling he was an artist / (35:36) Intros next song / (36:23) Performs Stripes / (39:04) Intros next song / (39:56) Performs We Went to The Beach / (42:25) Thanks audience and intros next song / (42:55) Performs Where It's At / (44:51) Final comments from Matt / (45:00) Walk-out music / (46:21) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Jenkins, Matt; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
